section.section:
An applicant for a peddler license shall pay to the clerk a license fee of:
$75, if the applicant sells at wholesale; or
$150, if the applicant sells at retail.
An applicant for a magazine seller license shall pay to the clerk a license fee of $50.

text.section: The clerk shall pay all money collected under this subtitle to the County Treasurer of Calvert County to be placed in the general fund of Calvert County.
